posts.post_content:
Wanting to doing a T205 back run of Jim Scott. Looking for cards in the Fair to Very Good range. Prefer SGC graded, but will also consider raw and PSA graded. Please let me know what you have and the price delivered.

Want List:

T205
- Honest Long Cut
- Piedmont Fact. 25
- Polar Bear
- Sovereign
- Sweet Caporal Black Fact. 25
- Sweet Caporal Black Fact. 42
- Sweet Caporal Red


Thanks,
James
